item.description:
This month, Rebecca Brodie of Brodie & Brodie will be presenting her entrepreneurial ideas and goals. The other members of the group will provide feedback and recommendations to help him/her advance to the next level of success.
The meeting is confidential and all disclosures therein are meant solely for the use of the participants and should not be shared outside of the group without the express consent and permission of the presenter.
All participants agree to maintain the strict confidentiality of any proprietary information that may be disclosed by members to the group.
Thank you very much.
item.how_to_find_us: call me at 508-930-4417 if you cannot find us
item.why: For entrepreneurs looking to have ideas from other entrepreneurs
item.name: The Framingham Small Business March Meetup
